brand_name: Bengaluru Bootstrap Boys - Cup of Noodles Style

large_heading.text_shadow: multi-layer red and golden shadows with animated glow

button_glow_animation.name: buttonGlow
button_glow_animation.description: Glowing border effect on CTA button

texture_patterns.body_background: Multi-layered radial gradients with diagonal lines creating noodle texture
texture_patterns.navbar_texture: Horizontal lines with radial dot patterns simulating cup rim
texture_patterns.hero_steam_pattern: Conic gradients with wavy SVG lines creating steam wisps
texture_patterns.noodle_emoji_overlay: üçú emoji at reduced opacity for subtle branding

shadows_and_borders.navbar_shadow: inset shadows with brown borders creating cup rim depth
shadows_and_borders.video_container_border: Multiple layered borders: brown, golden, with inset glow
shadows_and_borders.button_shadow: Multi-layer box shadows with glow effects

navbar.border: 6px solid brown bottom, 3px solid light brown top
navbar.shadow: Inset highlights and brown depth shadows

hero_container.background: Radial gradient with animated steam overlay
hero_container.effects: Animated steam wisps with SVG patterns

title_styling.line_1: Smaller text with perspective tilt and golden glow
title_styling.line_2: Large text with animated glow and 3D perspective

video_container.borders: Triple border: brown, golden outline, shadow
video_container.shadow: Deep shadows with golden glow inset

cta_button.border: Thick red border with golden outline
cta_button.typography: Heavy weight uppercase with wide spacing

mobile_768px.hero: Adjusted padding with maintained flex layout

mobile_480px.text: Smallest responsive sizes with maintained effects

hover_effects.nav_links: Brighter gradients with enhanced shadows and translateY
hover_effects.cta_button: Scale up with brighter gradient and enhanced glow

accessibility_considerations.color_contrast: High contrast maintained with dark red on golden backgrounds
accessibility_considerations.text_readability: Multiple text shadows ensure readability against gradient backgrounds
accessibility_considerations.interactive_feedback: Clear hover and active states with transform feedback
accessibility_considerations.responsive_text: Clamp() functions ensure readable text at all screen sizes

brand_personality.visual_tone: Bold, vibrant, playful like instant noodle packaging
